about.summary: Provides Map, Reduce and Filter variants to generate jobs on batch computing systems like PBS/Torque, LSF, SLURM and Sun Grid Engine. Multicore and SSH systems are also supported. For further details see the project web page.

name: r-batchjobs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.8' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-batchjobs
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/BatchJobs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/BatchJobs/BatchJobs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 35cc2dae31994b1df982d11939509ce965e12578418c4fbb8cd7a422afd6e4ff

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-bbmisc >=1.9
    - r-dbi
    - r-rsqlite >=1.0.9011
    - r-backports >=1.1.1
    - r-brew
    - r-checkmate >=1.8.0
    - r-data.table >=1.9.6
    - r-digest
    - r-sendmailr
    - r-stringi >=0.4_1
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-bbmisc >=1.9
    - r-dbi
    - r-rsqlite >=1.0.9011
    - r-backports >=1.1.1
    - r-brew
    - r-checkmate >=1.8.0
    - r-data.table >=1.9.6
    - r-digest
    - r-sendmailr
    - r-stringi >=0.4_1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('BatchJobs')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('BatchJobs')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/tudo-r/BatchJobs
  license: BSD_2_clause
  summary: Provides Map, Reduce and Filter variants to generate jobs on batch computing systems
    like PBS/Torque, LSF, SLURM and Sun Grid Engine. Multicore and SSH systems are also
    supported. For further details see the project web page.
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: BatchJobs
# Title: Batch Computing with R
# Description: Provides Map, Reduce and Filter variants to generate jobs on batch computing systems like PBS/Torque, LSF, SLURM and Sun Grid Engine. Multicore and SSH systems are also supported. For further details see the project web page.
# Author: Bernd Bischl <bernd_bischl@gmx.net>, Michel Lang <michellang@gmail.com>, Henrik Bengtsson <henrikb@braju.com>
# Maintainer: Bernd Bischl <bernd_bischl@gmx.net>
# URL: https://github.com/tudo-r/BatchJobs
# BugReports: https://github.com/tudo-r/BatchJobs/issues
# MailingList: batchjobs@googlegroups.com
# License: BSD_2_clause + file LICENSE
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0), BBmisc (>= 1.9), methods
# Imports: backports (>= 1.1.1), brew, checkmate (>= 1.8.0), data.table (>= 1.9.6), DBI, digest, parallel, RSQLite (>= 1.0.9011), sendmailR, stats, stringi (>= 0.4-1), utils
# Suggests: MASS, testthat
# LazyData: yes
# ByteCompile: yes
# Version: 1.8
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-05-09 08:41:04 UTC; lang
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-14 22:00:16 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
